Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent inquiries. Review the progress report prepared yesterday.
Present the progress report to senior management and answer any questions they may have. Address any concerns raised and solicit their feedback.
Follow up on any action items identified during the meeting with senior management.
Review the data being abstracted by @da-1 and @da-2 to ensure accuracy and completeness. Provide feedback and guidance as needed. @da-1, @da-2 Topic: Data Accuracy and Completeness Review.

Meet with @helpdesk-1 to discuss the process for handling user inquiries and technical issues related to the EHR system during the data abstraction process. Ensure that the help desk is adequately prepared to support the project. @helpdesk-1 Topic: Help Desk Support for Data Abstraction.

Analyze the abstracted data to identify any preliminary trends or patterns related to influenza incidence and vaccination rates. Share these findings with @clinlead-1 and @his-1 for their input. @clinlead-1, @his-1 Topic: Preliminary Data Analysis Findings.

Address any outstanding data quality issues identified by @qatest-1 and @qatest-2. Work with @da-1 and @da-2 to correct any errors or inconsistencies in the data. @qatest-1, @qatest-2, @da-1, @da-2 Topic: Data Quality Issue Resolution.
Document today's activities and update the project plan with progress made. Review the plan for tomorrow and identify any outstanding tasks.
